医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
对 20 岁以上健康成年人的研究表明，每日使用多种维生素与降低死亡率无关最近发表在《JAMA Network Open》上的一项研究确定了定期补充多种维生素 (MV) 与美国成年人死亡风险之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Study-of-healthy-adults-over-202b-years-reveals-daily-multivitamin-use-is-not-linked-with-mortality-benefit。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Study-of-healthy-adults-over-202b-years-reveals-daily-multivitamin-use-is-not-linked-with-mortality-benefit。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=adec0bf2-3115-4ec6-bb01-c6b7f273cccd Fri, 28 Jun 2024 07:12:00 -0400 Study of healthy adults over 20+ years reveals daily multivitamin use is not associated with mortality benefit
人工智能识别子宫内膜癌新的高风险亚型一种人工智能工具，用于对组织病理学图像进行分类并区分子宫内膜癌亚型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/AI-identizes-new-high-risk-subtype-in​​-endometrial-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/AI-identizes-new-high-risk-subtype-in​​-endometrial-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5073d4e-e192-4811-beda-dfa6a86a1c03 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 05:38:00 -0400 AI identifies new high-risk subtype in endometrial cancer
新研究将牛皮癣的严重程度与皮肤微生物群失调联系起来银屑病宿主-微生物相互作用的多组学分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/New-study-links-psoriasis-severity-to-skin-microbiome-dysbiosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/New-study-links-psoriasis-severity-to-skin-microbiome-dysbiosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e8d6053-2858-4541-a11f-334fe3bf6c68 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 04:23:00 -0400 New study links psoriasis severity to skin microbiome dysbiosis
以身作则：Bedfont® 在 2024 年世界福祉周期间鼓励员工福祉https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Leading-By-Example-Bedfontc2ae-Encourages-Employee-Well-being-for-World-Well-being-Week-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Leading-By-Example-Bedfontc2ae-Encourages-Employee-Well-being-for-World-Well-being-Week-2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=509c37d1-6e98-4893-a493-3cb84fbcbb65 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 03:43:00 -0400 Leading By Example: Bedfont® Encourages Employee Well-being for World Well-being Week 2024
新研究将儿童时期空气污染暴露与成人支气管炎联系起来一项新的研究揭示了生命早期接触空气污染与晚年肺部健康之间的联系。南加州大学凯克医学院领导的一个研究小组表明，儿童时期接触空气污染与成年后的支气管炎症状直接相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/New-study-links-childhood-air-pollution-exposure-to-adult-bronchitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/New-study-links-childhood-air-pollution-exposure-to-adult-bronchitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4c781cd-aab6-4827-a79c-c2009974f41b Fri, 28 Jun 2024 01:59:48 -0400 New study links childhood air pollution exposure to adult bronchitis
研究表明数字设备阻碍情绪成长孩子们在生命的最初几年里学到了很多关于自我调节的知识，即对某些情况的情感、心理和行为反应。其中一些行为与儿童选择刻意反应而不是自动反应的能力有关。这被称为努力控制，它是从环境中习得的，首先是通过孩子与父母的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Study-shows-digital-devices-hinder-emotional-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Study-shows-digital-devices-hinder-emotional-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5821f06d-c2cd-4ed6-9c1c-9540e3bd9a12 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 01:49:38 -0400 Study shows digital devices hinder emotional growth
最近的研究显示植物性肉类替代品对心脏健康没有显着益处在一项为期八周的试验中，研究人员发现，在新加坡队列中，与杂食饮食相比，植物性肉类饮食并没有显着改善心脏代谢健康生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Plant-based-meat-alternatives-show-no-significant-heart-health-benefits-in-recent-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Plant-based-meat-alternatives-show-no-significant-heart-health-benefits-in-recent-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46ea5b21-c53a-4c28-80fb-27b7c4439e26 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 01:41:00 -0400 Plant-based meat alternatives show no significant heart health benefits in recent study
临床试验旨在评估新型 EV-D68 治疗的安全性美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 正在赞助一项临床试验，以评估一种在研单克隆抗体治疗肠道病毒 D68 (EV-D68) 的安全性，该病毒可导致严重的呼吸道和神经系统疾病，例如急性弛缓性脊髓炎 (AFM) – 类似脊髓灰质炎。科学家们正在努力更好地了解 AFM，这种疾病在美国出现，每隔一年病例就会激增，主要是在过去十年的夏末几个月。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Clinical-trial-seeks-to-evaluate-safety-of-new-EV-D68-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Clinical-trial-seeks-to-evaluate-safety-of-new-EV-D68-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5f9c0ad-c67c-4877-b695-5d957d089db1 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 01:19:04 -0400 Clinical trial seeks to evaluate safety of new EV-D68 treatment
新研究揭示罕见基因变异显着增加心房颤动风险研究人员发现了显着增加心房颤动风险的罕见遗传变异，通过将这些变异与多基因风险评分相结合，增强了房颤风险分层。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/New-study-reveals-rare-genic-variants-significantly-increase-atrial-fibrillation-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/New-study-reveals-rare-genic-variants-significantly-increase-atrial-fibrillation-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a581cd5-d892-4e7b-8016-6882da43baf6 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 01:19:00 -0400 New study reveals rare genetic variants significantly increase atrial fibrillation risk
研究表明青少年智力低下与早期中风有关《流行病学与社区健康杂志》在线发表的一项研究发现，青少年时期智力水平较低可能与 50 岁之前中风的风险增加三倍有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Poorer-Teen-Mental-Ability-Linked-To-As-Much-As-Triplling-In-Stroke-Risk-Before-Age-Of-50。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Poorer-Teen-Mental-Ability-Linked-To-As-Much-As-Triplling-In-Stroke-Risk-Before-Age-Of-50。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6487b1f-aa1c-4a55-8adb-98230e775433 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 01:11:00 -0400 Study links low teenage mental ability to early stroke
